DOC.brief_summary: This study is a retrospective research in order to compare and analysis the risk factor, clinical manifestation and efficacy of albicans candidemia by pulling medical records. We hope that this retrospective research will let us understand the method of treatment and prevention of albicans candidemia in order to improve the quality of healthcare.
DOC.brief_title: Study and Analysis of Micafungin for Non-albican Candidemia: Efficacy, Risk Factor and Clinical Manifestation
DOC.criteria: above 20 years old hospital patients albicans candidemia patients pregnant patients or patients under 16 years old liver cirrhosis and Child C
